name: specifically-clementines
description: Groceries is a self-hosted shared grocery list app built for households. It supports multiple lists, real-time updates, and a mobile-friendly interface for shopping.
features: Shared grocery lists: Creates shopping lists accessible to all household members.
Real-time sync: Updates lists instantly across all devices.
Item categories: Organizes items by store sections for efficient shopping.
Check-off items: Marks items as purchased with tap or swipe.
Multiple lists: Manages separate lists for different stores or purposes.
Recipe integration: Adds ingredients from recipes directly to shopping list.
Quantity tracking: Specifies quantities and units for each item.
Recurring items: Automatically adds frequently purchased items.
Barcode scanning: Adds items by scanning product barcodes.
Price tracking: Records prices to monitor spending and find deals.
Mobile apps: Native Android app for shopping on the go.
Offline mode: Continues working without internet connection.
